message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice! That's a bit higher than I was hoping for. Would you be willing to do $85?
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I can see you're interested in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about $105?
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $105 is still a bit out of my budget.  I'm willing to go up to $95.  What do you think?
